attributes.action: Change the speed limit on three lane motorway to 70 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to change all three lane sections of the M8 Motorway Glasgow-Edinburgh to an advisory 70 mph speed limit.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
